review_data.title: Great daily and weekly lunch specials!
review_data.content: I had lunch here with my colleagues for our monthly team lunch in Zürich. You will not leave hungry! The portions are generous wihout feeling overloaded. I really enjoyed the Cordon Bleu, and the salads looked quite fresh. The prices are on par with most...More

review_data.title: Pretty good for lunch
review_data.content: We've been there several times for lunch. A Separate Lunch menu is available and that's really delicious! Pretty good for a short lunch break with friends. Speed is very good and you can be back in the office in 45min (including coffee ;))
